title: Milestone Data Farm Handbook Mr Bond
description: Web3 culture while remaining polished and versatile. The right designer will help us stand out in a crowded space with a bold visual identity that scales across platforms.

milestones.title: Phase 1: Style Guide
milestones.description: Collaborate with our team to understand brand values, audience, and aesthetic direction. Deliver moodboards, style frames, and an adaptable design system aligned with Web3 culture.

milestones.title: Phase 2 – Creation
milestones.description: Produce essential design assets including logo variations, banners, icons, NFT/token visuals, and social media templates, ensuring consistency and adaptability across digital channels.

milestones.title: Phase 3 – Package
milestones.description: Provide ongoing support for launch campaigns and potential partnerships.
